name: Tower Unite - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from Tower Unite. All the songs from the Game Worlds, Plaza, and more.
Composed and produced by William Smith. As a bonus, when new Game Worlds and activities that are released in Tower Unite, music from those will be added to this soundtrack at no extra charge.

100% of the earnings from this go straight to William Smith.

51 tracks included:

  • 1. Ballrace - Memories (02:32)
  • 2. Ballrace - Midori (04:19)
  • 3. Ballrace - Nimbus (04:07)
  • 4. Ballrace - Paradise (04:42)
  • 5. Minigolf - Customize (00:30)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 570 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: An MP3 or FLAC player
